member.name: T:Kingo.ExceptionMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageHandlerResult_AssertionOfMessageStreamFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One or more assertions for the published messages failed. See inner exception for details. .

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageHandlerResult_StreamNotEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected an empty stream, but stream contains {0} message(s)..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageStream_MessageNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message of type '{0}' not found at index '{1}': the MessageStream contains only {2} message(s)..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageStream_MessageNotOfExpectedKind
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Message at index '{0}' was expected to be of kind '{1}' but was '{2}'..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MessageStream_MessageNotOfExpectedType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected message of type '{0}' at index '{1}', but found message of type '{2}'..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorConfiguration_ProcessorAlreadyConfigured
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot invoke '{0}' at this point: the processor has already been configured..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorConfiguration_ProcessorNotYetConfigured
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot invoke '{0}' at this point: the processor has not yet been configured..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorConfiguration_ServicesAlreadyConfigured
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot invoke '{0}' at this point: the service collection has already been configured..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestContext_MessageStreamNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot retrieve the MessageStream of '{0}' because its results haven't been saved in this context..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestContext_TestAlreadyRun
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot save the MessageStream of '{0}' because a previous result of this test has already been saved..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_AssertionOfExceptionFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One or more assertions for exception of type '{0}' failed. See inner exception for details..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_ExceptionNotOfExpectedType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected an exception of type '{0}', but encountered an exception of type '{1}' instead..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_ExceptionNotThrown
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The expected exception of type '{0}' was not thrown..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_ExceptionThrown
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unexpected exception of type '{0}' was thrown..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_InnerExceptionNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Exception of type '{0}' was expected to have an inner-exception of type '{1}', but did not have any inner-exception..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.MicroProcessorTestResult_ResultNotVerified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Test failed by default because its result was not verified..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.NullTestResult_MissingResult
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Test '{0}' did not produce any result. Please verify that the processor provided as an argument to the WhenAsync-method has been used to handle a message or execute a query..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.UnexpectedExceptionResult_UnexpectedException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Test '{0}' threw unexpected exception of type '{1}'. See inner exception for details..
